archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.2.7: Security-related events (stored in event logs) should be extracted to a central store (e.g. using an automated security information and event management (SIEM) tool or similar log management tool).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
